intelligence of any nature by wire, visual or other electro-magnetic emissions, R
or Hertzian waves, galvanic, electric or magnetic means;

required so to do by the Central Government, shall permit the Government to establish and
telegraph upon any part of the land of the Company, and shall give every reasonable facility 
the same.

repeatedly committed.—(1) Whenever it appears to the State Government that 
causing or likely to cause wrongful damage to any telegraph is repeatedly and ma

of this section.
